title: About

Ryan is a student at Tufts University.


Tufts University | September 2020 - May 2024 (ant.)

title: About Me
text:
Hi! I’m an undergrad student at Tufts University studying Quantitative Economics as well as math and French. I am interested in harnessing data to explore causality, especially using tools in contemporary micro-econometrics research.
I’m using this website to store bits and bobs from my travels.
